
                            
                            <p>月初就报名了，加油了500，非加油交易金额超过了5000，但知道今天还是显示未达标，广发车主卡一样的操作在金额数达到后两天左右就显示已达标了，请问大家的华为车主卡也是这样吗？<img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/31/161144x3h6mhv3h9h7wv3v.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/31/161144x3h6mhv3h9h7wv3v.jpg"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/31/161146pnxxhbsxfbbs2fis.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202501/31/161146pnxxhbsxfbbs2fis.jpg">	    	     <br> </p>
